price: Na hakika tumekuwekeni katika ardhi, na tumekujaalieni humo njia za kupatia maisha. Ni kuchache kushukuru kwenu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ مَكَّنَّٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَشۡكُرُونَ
footnotes: Nasi tumekuwekeni katika ardhi, na tukakupeni nguvu za kuiamirisha mkajipatia manufaa ndani yake, na tukakusahilishieni njia za kupatia maisha. Juu ya neema hizi zote, kumekuwa kuchache mno kumshukuru kwenu Mwenyezi Mungu. Nanyi mtakuja pata malipo ya hayo myatendayo!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaqad makkannākum fī al-arḍi wajaʿalnā lakum fīhā maʿāyisha qalīlan mā tashkurūna
